name: Drogue
description:
Play as a Banana who is fighting off hordes of Dice-Flies! armed with only a gun that uses dice as ammo, you must face off against hordes of monsters while collecting pips to buy upgrades for your die! Increase the success rate of both your damage and currency die by replacing faces with better ones!

!Be warned! you must wait for the dice to roll before damage is dealt!

Play in maximized for best experience!

*note if game lags try playing on different browser or download windows version
